trans-unit.source: PowerShell Module Discovery, Install and Inventory with PowerShellGet
trans-unit.target: PowerShell Module Discovery, Install and Inventory with PowerShellGet

trans-unit.source: PowerShellGet is included in this release of WMF:
trans-unit.target: PowerShellGet is included in this release of WMF:

trans-unit.source: Find-Module can filter on module metadata with the -Tag parameter
trans-unit.target: Find-Module can filter on module metadata with the -Tag parameter

trans-unit.source: Find-Module can filter on repository-specific search language with the -Filter parameter
trans-unit.target: Find-Module can filter on repository-specific search language with the -Filter parameter

trans-unit.source: Find-Module can filter based on module contents with the -Command, -DscResource, and -Includes parameters
trans-unit.target: Find-Module can filter based on module contents with the -Command, -DscResource, and -Includes parameters

trans-unit.source: Find-DscResource allows discovery of individual DSC resources in repositories
trans-unit.target: Find-DscResource allows discovery of individual DSC resources in repositories

trans-unit.source: Support for installing from and publishing to file shares with NuGet
trans-unit.target: Support for installing from and publishing to file shares with NuGet

trans-unit.source: Side-by-side version support on Windows PowerShell 5.0 or newer
trans-unit.target: Side-by-side version support on Windows PowerShell 5.0 or newer
